item.title: Hello World
item.description:
This is my first note. I want to link to a math concept.

I will use a WikiLink here: [[Linear Algebra]].

(The script will automatically turn that bracketed text into a link to the linear-algebra post).

item.title: Linear Algebra
item.description:
The Math Page

This page was linked to from the “Hello World” page.

Here is a matrix equation:

$$ \mathbf{A}\vec{x} = \lambda \vec{x} $$

Return to [[Hello]].
